slogan.home s1 2: Running on the secure and reliable NewChain, NewSwap offers the high performance and low cost trades on multiple inter-blockchain assets and newton ecosystem tokens with automated market makers and a dual-token liquidity mining mechanism design. All transaction fees are provided to liquidity providers and governed by the community.
slogan.home s1 3: Everyone is able to issue and trade digital assets
